page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our square is situated 12 miles south of Manchester on the edge of the Cheshire green belt.The area takes in the southern edge of the village of Bramhall and the village of Woodford. Both these villages have grown due to Manchester commuters moving into the area.New housing estates of mainly detatched houses have been built to accomodate these people. The area is predominantly rural. However the major influence regarding employment is British Aerospace. British Aerospace covers a very large area,including runways,and yet manages to remain unobtrusive upon the landscape. It is a fairly affluent area where entertainment is on a community basis with further activities available in Manchester and Stockport.
